short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension to customize your new tab sports experience & default search

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Sports Caravan is a new cool browser extension that will let you change the experience of your browser new tab and choose from some awesome sports backgrounds already pre-built in the extension source for every athlete's taste! 

In addition to this awesome feature your search will be powered by Bing.

By clicking "Add to chrome", I accept and agree to installing the "SportsCaravan" tab extension and setting Chrome New Tab search to Bing provided by the service and the Terms of Use at https://sportscaravan.co/t-o-s/ and Privacy Policy at https://sportscaravan.co/privacy-policy/
